Membantu proses rekap absensi, pengajuan cuti, atau dokumen HR jika diperlukan.

Membantu membuat laporan administrasi harian/mingguan.

Menangani kebutuhan operasional ringan seperti pemesanan alat tulis kantor atau jadwal rapat.

data.deskripsi_posisi: We are looking for two Civil Engineering students to join our team as interns. This internship offers valuable hands-on experience in real project environments and company operations. The selected interns will assist our engineers and management team in various activities, including site visits, field surveys, data collection, and preparing technical and business reports. You will also help create presentation materials and project summary slides (PPT) for internal meetings and client updates. This position is ideal for university students who want to gain practical exposure to both engineering and business operations. Candidates should be responsible, detail-oriented. Basic computer and PowerPoint skills are required. During the internship, you will have the opportunity to learn project coordination, report writing, and professional communication in a real engineering companyÂ environment.

data.deskripsi_posisi: We are looking for an enthusiastic Marketing Intern to join our team and support daily business and client communication activities. The ideal candidate should be a university student majoring in Marketing or Business Administration, fluent in English and Indonesian, and passionate about learning how to connect companies with clients. The intern will assist in communicating with customers, preparing marketing materials, coordinating meetings, and helping the company build and maintain client relationships. You will also help identify potential business opportunities and support the management team in achieving marketing goals. This internship is an excellent opportunity to gain real experience in international business communication and marketing operations. Candidates should be proactive, responsible, and have good communication and teamwork skills. During the internship, you will develop your ability to handle client interactions, understand market needs, and contribute to real businessÂ negotiations.

data.deskripsi_posisi:
- Design, develop, and maintain frontend and backend architecture for web applications.
- Develop user-facing features using frontend technologies like HTML5, CSS3, - JavaScript frameworks (e.g., ReactJS, AngularJS, VueJS).
- Build and manage APIs for seamless integration with backend services.

data.deskripsi_posisi:
- Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture.
- Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional and non-functional business requirements.
- Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.
- Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and On-prem/Cloud technologies.
- Design and implement Change Data Capture (CDC) frameworks to support real-time and incremental data ingestion.
- Develop and manage data streaming solutions (e.g., Kafka, Spark Streaming, Flink, or similar) to process and deliver real-time data for analytics and operational needs.
- Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics.
- Ability to speak, writer and conversation with English (MUST HAVE)
